sentences.en: A day, avanti buys the pork again, he skimp A Fan carries half jins meaty.
sentences.cn: 一天, 阿凡提又来买肉, 他又少给了阿凡提半斤多肉.

sentences.en: Don't skimp the butter in making a cake.
sentences.cn: 做糕点时不要吝惜放奶油.

sentences.en: Don't skimp the butter when you make cakes.
sentences.cn: 你做蛋糕时不要吝惜用奶油.

sentences.en: Eg : They have to skimp on fuel in winter.
Kids Who Skimp on Sleep Tend to Be Fatter.
sentences.cn: 睡眠过少的孩子容易发胖.

sentences.en: Many families must skimp on their food and other necessities just to meet the monthly rent.
sentences.cn: 就为了交齐每月的租金，许多家庭不得不省吃俭用。

sentences.en: Older people should not skimp on food or heating.
sentences.cn: 老人吃饭和取暖不应吝惜。

sentences.en: Older people should not skimp on food or heating.
sentences.cn: 老者不应节省食物或暖气.

sentences.en: Older people shouldn't skimp on food or heating.
sentences.cn: 老年人不应过分吝惜食物或取暖方面的开销.

sentences.en: She had to skimp to send her son to college.
sentences.cn: 她必须节俭来供她儿子上大学.

sentences.en: They had to skimp ( on everything ) to send their sons to college.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不省吃俭用以便送儿子进大学.

sentences.en: Those results could be particularly important nowadays, as many people skimp on sleep.
sentences.cn: 由于现在许多人都睡眠不足,该项研究结果有着特殊的重要意义.

sentences.en: Use plenty of oil. Don't skimp!

words.tran_cn: 克扣；对…不够用心；舍不得给；少给

trans.tran_en: If you skimp on something, you use less time, money, or material for it than you really need, so that the result is not good enough
